title: Stacking Cover Crops Benefits with Jim Stute

tasks.task: Attend a strip till conference and engage with cover crop users.
subtasks: Respond to a quiz about cover crop usage.
Address audience concerns and motivations for cover crop use.
Present research on cover crop yield responses and financial benefits.
Discuss the impact of cover crops on weed suppression and herbicide resistance.
Examine the role of cover crops in soil health and nutrient management.
Share experiences and results from on-farm research trials using cover crops.
Address farmer concerns regarding yield variability and first-year impacts of cover crops.
Highlight the importance of adaptive management and best practices for cover crop use.
